title: Poster for the Stefan Sagmeister AIGA Program in Detroit [Text scratched onto the  nude body of the designer]
description:
Poster is both announcement of an AIGA program and a self portrait of the designer.  Color photographic reproduction of designer shown from mouth to lower waist and holding package of "Duane Reade" brand band-aids in right hand against red drapery.  Text is inscribed on body with X-acto knife.  Inscribed on chest, "STEFAN/SAGMIESter/ AIGA DETROIT/ & CRANBROOK/ ACADEMY/ OF/ ART/ Style=FART/ THURSDAY, FEB 25, 1999/ de SALLE Auditorium/ AT CRANBROOK/ 6:30 pm".  Inscribed on his right side of waist, "DONATIONS: PRINTING BY GRAPHIC/ ENTREPRISES/ PAPER BY NATIONWIDE/ PAPERS/ ENGRAVING BY ADGRAVES/ PHOTO BY  TOM/ SCHIERLITZ". Inscribed on his left side of waist, "SPONSORS:/ BLACK WHITE & COLORS/ ARMSTRONG/WHITE/ NATIONWIDE/ PAPERS". 
Bandage below his right nipple region.
Vertically inscribed on right arm, "AIGA MEMBERS FREE, NON-MEMBERS $5./ $5.--"
name: Poster
